question:
The T N Manoharan task force for development of secondary market for corporate loans had summited its recommendations. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The task force reported the lack of a systematic loan sales platform to be an impeding factor for this market.
  2. It recommends setting up a central loan contract registry.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: The task force was set up to look into the possibility of setting up a secondary market for loans. The report presented absence of a loan sales platform, lack of standardisation of documentation, legal factors, etc. to be major impediments for this market. To tackle this, it recommends setting up an online loan sale platform. Statement 2 is correct: The task force recommends the setting up of a central loan contract registry. This will deal with deciding the technological, infrastructure, structural aspects, etc. of this new market. A self-regulatory body (SRB) will be responsible for standardisation of the documentation.
